title: Dreams of Drowning
description: Alix has followed the enteri to the city of Haith where he finds himself immersed in the household of Havgard, a powerful magician, and where he realises that he must fact the harrowing events of this own past. After he has revealed his secrets, Havgard gives him a further devastating piece of information about his own origins.Alix is not the only one to have secrets for the enteri, Midnight, must also face up to his part in the events of the distant past which have led to this present war.As the summer days lengthen und war seems inevitable, Alix is forced to view his new friends in a different light. It seems that no-one - from childhood friends, to benevolent magicians, to long lost enteri heroes und villains - is what he thought, least of all Alix himself.
author: Fiona McGavin
